_source.text: 8 Reasons Why the Cleveland Indians Are Better Than the Detroit Tigers

text: 8 Reasons Why the **Cleveland** **Indians** Are **Better** **Than** the Detroit Tigers

_source.text: 5. So, the Cleveland Indians just keep on winning, five games better than any other AL team ... and one of us still doesn't believe.

text: 5. So, the **Cleveland** **Indians** just keep on winning, five games **better** **than** any other AL team ... and one of us still doesn't believe.

_source.text: After a tough week at the hands of the New York Yankees and Cleveland Indians, the Baltimore Orioles seem to like nothing better than some home cooking.

text: After a tough week at the hands of the **New** **York** **Yankees** and **Cleveland** **Indians**, the Baltimore
Orioles seem to like nothing **better** **than** some home cooking.

_source.text: After a puzzling decline that lasted nearly three years, Jimenez rediscovered his form and was mostly brilliant in the final four months of 2013 with the Cleveland Indians, registering a 2.40 ERA and striking out better than a hitter per inning over 22 starts.

striking out **better** **than** a hitter per inning over 22 starts.
